definitions.definition: The small portion remaining of a larger thing or group.
examples: The remnants of Neanderthals were mixed with Homo sapiens .

definitions.definition: The remaining fabric at the end of the bolt .
examples: Usually not enough to make an entire project by itself, remnants of several fabrics can be used to make quilts .

definitions.definition: An unsold end of piece goods, as cloth, ribbons, carpets, etc.
examples: All the remnants were sold in the flea market .
A large number of remnants were taking up too much space, so we disposed of them.

main_definition: The small portion remaining of a larger thing or group.
secondary_definitions: The remaining fabric at the end of the bolt .
An unsold end of piece goods, as cloth, ribbons, carpets, etc.
